text: Samantha Harris (born Samantha Harris Shapiro, November 27, 1973) is an American television hostess. She was the co-host of seasons two through nine of Dancing with the Stars with Tom Bergeron. From 2010â€“12, she was a correspondent at Entertainment Tonight. In April 2014, Harris announced that she was diagnosed with breast cancer and would undergo a double mastectomy. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American television presenters Category:People from Minnesota
title: Samantha Harris
